comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ripon Her husband was: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_Robinson,_2nd_Marquess_of... I started an entry for her: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lady_Constance_Gwladys

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Richard Arthur Norton.  Tell you what, we'll correct the spelling of her title in our record, and you correct the spelling of her middle name, Gladys, in your wikipedia entry.  OK? She brought Diaghilev's Ballet Russes to London in 1911.
